attributes.action: Lack of EMI Nursing homes in Hampshire - separating families
attributes.additional_details:
DEMENTIA

Why are there so few EMI Nursing Homes in the Hampshire area?  Existing EMI homes have been closed down.  This situation leads to families being separated through distance at a time when they need each other.

No provision is made for transport for people who struggle to visit loved ones. No support offered, families just left to to deal with the situation as best they can

.
